title: Pointing the way: active collaborative filtering
proctitle: CHI '95: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: David Maltz
authors.institution: Dept. of Computer Science, Carnegie-Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA

authors.name: Kate Ehrlich
authors.institution: Lotus Development Corporation, One Rogers St, Cambridge, MA
